activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tyrrel L Anderson

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.

1:01 PM 22CF22/22CF119 - Defendant Tyrrel L Anderson not in court.  Attorney Stephen Eric Mays in court for Tyrrel L Anderson.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mays states that his client has called his office this morning and asks for this case to be held off until later today. Attorney Harper asks for a warrant. Court orders a warrant and if he shows up today then the court will recall these cases.

12:11 PM Atty. Mays appears in front of the Court, requesting that this matter, set for 1:30 today, be called now and reset to 9/26 at 1. Atty. Mays states that he has talked with DA Harper and VWC Fields. Court adjourns this matter to 9/26 at 1.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:01 PM Defendant Tyrrel L Anderson in court.  Attorney Stephen Eric Mays in court for Tyrrel L Anderson.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mays has received the complaint and waives the formal reading. Attorney Mays waives the 20 day time period for the preliminary hearing. Max penalties stated. Attorney Harpers ask for a preliminary hearing. Court enters a NG plea on count 2 and 3 only. Count one will need a preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Adjourned initial appearance on July 20, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 29, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:15 AM Attorney Stephen Eric Mays appeared by video means for Defendant Tyrrel L Anderson. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mays has received the complaint but hasn't had time to speak with his defendant. Attorney Mays asks for another date.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 003823,

Adjourned initial appearance on March 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.

02:31 PM Defendant Tyrrel L Anderson appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. TA hasn't received the complaint. TA hasn't called the public defenders office. Court advises TA to called the publid defenders office and resets case.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant was released from bond on 02/03/22 but given today's date as a return date per request of DA Harper. Defendant called the Clerk of Court on 02/15/22 and received the zoom information along with date/time.
